subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
Sports Injuries
Athletics and Sports
Medicine and Health
lead_paragraph: A conference at the Mayo Clinic recommended prohibiting contact to the head at every level of the game, including the N.H.L., and banning body checking by 11- and 12-year-olds.
snippet: A conference at the Mayo Clinic recommended prohibiting contact to the head at every level of the game, including the N.H.L., and banning body checking by 11- and 12-year-olds.
